jot.manager.ai

Class AbstractAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.manager.ai.AbstractAI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPathFindersManager, AbstractSteeringBehaviorsManager

    public abstract class AbstractAI
extends Object
    Abstract class that specifies the methods that each A.I. class should implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        Returns:
        the agent assigned game object.

        Parameters:
        primaryAgent - the agent assigned game object.

      • getPrimaryGoal

        public Agent getPrimaryGoal()
        Get the primary goal. This can be either a target position/rotation, an identifier for a goal stored in a transform group, etc., not necessarily a player.
        Returns:
        the primary goal.

      • setPrimaryGoal

        public void setPrimaryGoal(GameObject primaryGoal)
        Set the primary goal. This can be either a target position/rotation, an identifier for a goal stored in a transform group, etc., not necessarily a player.
        Parameters:
        primaryGoal - either a target position/rotation, an identifier for a goal stored in a transform group.
